messages.title: Labour: Your Best Choice for Reading
messages.content: The effort Labour made to support the local economy paid off when times got tough. Reading was far better placed than most to weather the storm.

messages.title: A Future Fair for All
messages.content: Labour's future fair for all means supporting families into work, improving school standards and protecting frontline services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour works for Reading. The effort Labour made to support the local economy paid off when times got tough.
Investing in Reading schools with an increase from the Conservatives' £3,125 to Labour's £4,625 per pupil, an upsurge of 57 percent.
Labour improved funding for NHS and aimed to build new hospitals and clinics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The elections on May 6 are crucial. The Tories in Reading are trying to get control of your Council.

issues.economy: Support the local economy to make it stronger, ensuring continuity to support recovery or sending the economy into reverse.
issues.education: Improving funding per pupil and raise standards. Investing £4,625 in Reading schools with Labour.
issues.governance: Labour wants to make sure that Reading is a great place to work, live and learn for everyone.
issues.health: Improved funding for NHS and aiming to build new hospitals and clinics.
